ViewObject.Name: InvoiceCountVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select distinct i.invc_no invc_no, i.doc_id DOC_ID, trunc(i.doc_dt) invc_dt, i.coa_id SUPPLIER_ID from mm.mm$invc i, mm.mm$invc$dtl d, mm.mm$mtl$rcpt$srno s, mm.mm$invc$itm v where i.doc_id = nvl(:BindDocId,i.doc_id) AND I.CLD_ID=:BindCldId AND I.SLOC_ID=:BindSlocId AND I.ORG_ID=:BindOrgId AND i.doc_id=d.doc_id and i.cld_id=d.cld_id and i.sloc_id=d.sloc_id and i.org_id=d.org_id and d.doc_id_rcpt=s.doc_id and d.sloc_id=s.sloc_id and d.cld_id=s.cld_id and d.org_id=s.org_id and d.cld_id=v.cld_id and d.sloc_id=v.sloc_id and d.doc_id=v.doc_id AND exists (SELECT 1 FROM APP.APP$FA$GRP$RULE G, APP.ORG$FA$ITM$GRP$RULE r, APP.Org$fa$itm$rule i, app.org o where g.cld_id=o.org_cld_id and g.cntry_id=o.org_country_id and g.sloc_id=o.org_create_ref_sloc_id and g.cld_id=r.cld_id and g.cntry_id=r.cntry_id and g.sloc_id=r.sloc_id and g.fa_grp_id=r.mm_itm_grp_id and g.fa_prf_id=r.fa_prf_id and r.cld_id=i.cld_id and r.cntry_id=i.cntry_id and r.sloc_id=i.sloc_id and r.ho_org_id=i.ho_org_id and r.org_id=i.org_id and r.cld_id=o.org_cld_id and r.cntry_id=o.org_country_id and r.sloc_id=o.org_create_ref_sloc_id and r.org_id=o.org_id and r.cld_id=:BindCldId and r.sloc_id=:BindSlocId and r.org_id=:BindOrgId and i.actv_flg='Y' and i.finalize='Y' and i.cld_id=v.cld_id and i.sloc_id=v.sloc_id and i.org_id=v.org_id and i.mm_itm_id =v.itm_id) AND not exists (SELECT 1 FROM mm.mm$fa$itm$src x,mm.mm$fa$itm y where x.cld_id=y.cld_id and x.sloc_id=y.sloc_id and x.ho_org_id=y.ho_org_id and x.doc_id=y.doc_id and x.cld_id=:BindCldId and x.sloc_id=:BindSlocId and x.org_id=:BindOrgId and x.doc_id_src=v.doc_id and x.cld_id=v.cld_id and x.sloc_id=v.sloc_id and x.org_id=v.org_id)
